replies.body:
I will surely continue to build more maps and get better, you will most likely hear of me in the future... But every good thing has to come to an end....

Avicus is not fun for me no more... Its just painful.

I tried so hard to achieve Mod, failed. One paragraph ruined it all...
I tried to keep a topic healthy, failed. I just gave it to someone...
I tried to achieve map dev, failed. I released three maps in a day... Looks like it wont happen....



Im faking retarded overall
